issue.title: [CF 83] Need to add targeting
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 5.1.2600 Service Pack 3

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 2.4.0

Description

i mean add "If mouseover(target, pet,target,focus) target = "name"("totem name Ð¾r pet name") then show icon of spell(or macro name)

Installed Addons

Addon Control Panel - 3.3.13 Atlasloot Enhanced - v6.01.02 Auctionator - Version 2.8.7 AutoRepair - AutoRepair 2.0.1 Bagnon - 2.14.0b (No Guild Bank) Bartender4 - 4.4.15 Cancelator - Mass Auction Cancel Utility - v1.2.2 Crap Away! - Crap Away! 1.4 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.70-r4833 ErrorMonster - r88 FuBar - GuildFu - 2.4.4 - r117 Gladius - v2.0.10-beta MacroBank - r56 MailGet2 - MailGet2 2.0 MrTrader - v0.6.5.1 NamePlateAdvance - 2011.1.4 OmniCC - 4.0.waffles11 Outfitter - 5.2 Pet Ability List - 4.0.2 Prat 3.0 - r776 SatrinaBuffFrame - 3.2.3 Scroll Master - v4.2.17 simpleMinimap - v40000-3 Skada Damage Meter - 1.2-31 SlashToggleErrors - SlashToggleErrors v1.2 Tabbed Dungeon Browser (tabDB) - tabDB2.4a2 TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 2.4.0 WIM (WoW Instant Messenger) v3 - 3.5.1 XLoot - r370-release XLootGroup - r62-release X-Perl UnitFrames - r508
